name: Khyle. LORA [9mb]
description:
This is a LoRA for Khyle. He has a fairly unique artstyle so while I wanted to get as close as possible, I also wanted to allow for some creativity with prompts. Pretty sure I obtained that.

A 8DIM LoRA train, which results in a 9mb file is also great given its power.

For weighting, 0.7-0.8 should be strong enough, but to get closer to the images that Khyle makes, I do suggest using the prompts:

The model I used to train, and also for the images is AbyssOrangemixv2

'warm lighting, (rough drawing), (film grain), blurry'

It gives me the best results but you could probably try harder for the more painterly look.

Enjoy

If you have any LoRA requests and wouldnt mind buying me a Hot Chocolate, please consider going to my page. https://www.buymeacoffee.com/JohnStinko

modelVersions.name: v1
modelVersions.description: 44 images, 512x512, 100 steps per image, 4 epochs, 17,6k steps. 8DIM
